analysis_age: The term "ambitious" may subtly favour younger candidates who are often perceived as being more driven and eager to advance quickly in their careers.
text: 2 SCdP is needed at the g Hotel, Wellpark, Galway City, H91 V0HR, Ireland. The ideal candidate will be passionate about food and willing to work as a team in a fast-paced environment. Be trained and qualified to a professional level. Be passionate about food and presentation. Work as part of a close team & comply with all standards set by the Head Chef & management. Ensure that food preparation and presentation are of the highest quality, & are according to company standards. Be an ambitious person with a positive attitude. Be eager and passionate about the food industry with a focus on delivering and maintaining the highest standards of quality. Have 5 years of experience in a similar role. Be flexible as weekend work will be involved. Salary 34, 000 - 38, 000 euro/ annually depend on experience.
